px-modal
============

## Using px-modal

`px-modal` is a standard pop out dialog window.

```html
<px-modal>
	<px-actionbar dark>...</px-actionbar>
	<px-content>
		...
	</px-content>
	<px-actionbar secondary bottom>
		<span flex></span>
		<px-button>Cancel</px-button>
		<px-button primary>OK</px-button>
	</px-actionbar>
</px-modal>
```
